namobuddhāya ||
1. namaskāraśloka:---
pramāṇavārttikam
(vidhūṃtakalpanājālagambhīrodāramūrttaye
namaḥ samantabhadrāya samantasphararaṇatviṣe) || 1 ||
yo vidhvastasamastabandhanagatissamyag vaśitve sthita: (,)
sarvvajñeyavisārinirmmalatamajñānaprabandhodayaḥ |
sattvārthodyatamānasaśca suciraṃ śrīmañjunātho vibhu: (,)
tannatvā bahuśodya vāttikagataṃ kiñcidvivakṣāmyahaṃ ||
ṭīkākṛtaḥ sakala eva guṇaḥ sa eṣa brūtetra vastugahanepi yadasmadādiḥ |
dignāgadantamusa (? śa) laiviṣame'panīte labdheṣu vartmasu sukhaṃ kalabhāḥ prayānti ||
yo māmavajñāyati kopi guṇābhimānī jānātyasau kimapi taṃ prati naiṣa yatnaḥ |
kaścid bhaviṣyati kadācidanena cārthī nānādhiyāñjagati janmavatāṃ hi nāntaḥ ||
yadyapi hi śāstrārambhe namaskāraślokopanyāsamantareṇa kāyavātmanobhiriṣṭa-
devatānamaskārakaraṇena puṇyopacayādavighnena śāstrasya
parisamāptirbhavati |
tathāpi vyākhyātṛśrotṝṇāṃ stutipurassarayā pravṛttyā puṇyā tiśayotpādāt pārāyaṃ
sadācārānupālanaṃ cālocya viśiṣṭadevatāpūjāślokamupanyastavānācāryaḥ |
vidhūtakalpanetyādi |
yadā samantabhadraśabdo rūḍhayā bodhisattvavṛtto na gṛhyate tadeyaṃ buddhasya
bhagavataḥ pūjā | sā ca dvidhā stotrataḥ praṇāmataśca | namaḥśabdena praṇāmataḥ
pariśiṣṭaiḥ stotrataḥ | stotramapi svārthasampattitaḥ parārthasampattitaḥ parārtha-
saṃpadupāyataśca tridhā | svārthasampannaśca parārthaprati samartho bhavatīvi

2. Nams-pa-yin-te.

na saṃyogaḥ | prāsādaḥ svayameva saṃyogasvabhāvaḥ pareṇāsaṃyogācca | tata eva saṃkhyā-
bhāvaḥ, tatsaṃyogena puruṣaiśca viśiṣṭā sattā hi nagaramiti cet, kimasyā
niratiśayāyā' viśeṣaṇam | sattāyāścaikatvāt | nagarabahutve'pi nagarāṇīti
bahuvacanaṃ॰ na syāt | dvayasya parasparasahitateti cet | anupakāryopakārayoḥ ka
vastutvaṃ nagarasyāsiddhaṃ saṃyogasya guṇapadārthatvādityata āha | na saṃyoga ityādi |
na saṃyogasvabhāvantagaraṃ | tathā kāṣṭheṣṭakādīnāmvijātīyānāṃ kāryadravyānārambhāt
prāsādopi na dravyātmakaḥ kintu saṃyogasvabhāva iṣyate (1) saṃyogaśca guṇo nirguṇāśca
guṇā iti kutaḥ prāsādasya saṃyogo yena tatsaṃyogātmakaṃ nagaraṃ syāt |
etadevāha | prāsādasyetyādi | patyarthāntareṇāsaṃyogācca na saṃyogo
nagaraṃ | cakāreṇānantaranirdiṣṭāt prāsādādīnāṃ viśliṣṭānāmasaṃyogācca na
saṃyogo nagarabhityetat samuccīyate | tadevaṃ prāsādādīnāmubhayathā saṃyogābhāvena |
nagarasya saṃyogasvabhāvatā nirastā |
prāsādādīnāṃ yā saṃkhyā tadātmakaṃ nagarambhaviṣyatīti cedāha | tata eva
saṃkhyābhāva iti | yasmāt saṃyogātmakaprāsādastata eva kāraṇāt prāsādasya
saṃkhyāyā abhāvo nirguṇatvād guṇānāṃ | saṃkhyāpi hi guṇasvabhāvā | sa cāsau
saṃyogaśca tatsaṃyogaḥ | prāsādātmakaḥ saṃyoga ityarthaḥ | tatsaṃyogena puruṣaiśca viśiṣṭā
yā sattā sā nagaramiti cet | kimasyāḥ sattāyā ekatvānnityatvācca nirati-
śayāyā viśeṣaṇaṃ | na hi prāsādapuruṣādaya sattāṃ viśiṣanti | anādheyātiśaya-
tvāt | tasmāt sattā nirviśeṣaṇā | tasyā nagaratve sarvatra nagaratvaṃ syādityabhi-
prāyaḥ | sattāyāścaikatvāditi | dravyaguṇakarmasvekeṃva sattā vyāpinī | nagarabahutvepi

nagare prakṛte nagarabahutvaṃ kathaṃ syāt | dvayasyeti prāsādapuruṣāde: sattāyāśca

|4. sāmānyacintā
pṛthagabhidhānāt | arthasya hi tenā'vyabhicārāt tataḥ 7 kalpanāt | nirloṭhitaṃ 473b
caitadācāryeṇa |
tad gavādiśabdapratyupasthāpitamarthaṃ bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā pṛcchan, arthāntarasya
upanyāsena tatra dvidhā buddhiḥ kutaḥ kriyate | tasmād yosyātmā 'nanyasādhāraṇaḥ
taṃ puraskṛtya viśiṣṭārtha kriyārthī puruṣo'yaṃ pravarttate | yathā gorbāhadohādau nānya-
sambhāvinyayeṃ | yathā yuddha' praveśe yathāsvaṃ śabdenocyate, na dravyatvādi sāmānyam |
padyate | tato vyavahartṝṇāmadhyavasāyavaśācchandavyāpārāpekṣayaitaduktaṃ | śabde tu jñāna
svalakṣaṇapratibhāso nāstīti svalakṣaṇamavācyamuktamityadoṣaḥ |
dravyādayastu na tatreti | gaurityādiśabdairgavādicodanāyāṃ | kasmāt yathāsvaṃ
dravyatvādiśabdaisteṣāṅga vādeḥ pṛthagabhidhānāt godravyamityādinā | kathantarhi
gaurityādipadaprayoge sattādravyatvādayaḥ pratīyanta ityāha | arthasyetyādi | arthasya
gavādeḥ | tena sattvadravyatvādinā'vyabhicārāt | tatorthād gatiḥ sāmānyānāṃ
syāt | na tu viśeṣaśabda: sāmānye vyāpriyate | nirloṭhitaṃ caitadācārya diṅ nāgena
sāmānya parīkṣādau yathā na viśeṣaśabdānāṃ sāmānye vṛttiriti |
atra codyate | kasya punaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣeṇāvyabhicāraḥ | yattāvat para-
parikalpitannāstyeva| yaccānyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ prasajya mātrantadapi nāstyeva |
nāpi vikalpabuddhipratibhāsino bāhyenāvyabhicārosti tasya svatantratvāt |
ucyate | svalakṣaṇameva sajātīyavyāvṛttamviśeṣa: | tadeva vijātīyavyāvṛtti-
mapekṣyābhedenopāttaṃ sāmānyamityucyate | tataḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayorvastuta ekatvāt |
kṛtakatvānityatvayorivāvyabhicāraḥ | śabdavyāpārabhedāttu kevalaṃ kvacicchābdī
pratipattiḥ kvacidārthotyucyate | taditi tasmādayaṃ puruṣa: | gavādiśabdapratyupasthā-
pitaṅ gavādiśabdasannidhāpitamarthamarthakriyāśrayaṃ | arthāntarasya sāmānyasyopanyāsena
bhedasāmānyākāratayā dvimukhā buddhiryasya sa tathoktaḥ | yosya gavāderātmā
svabhāvaḥ | ananyabhāvasādhāraṇassa eva svabhāva : śabdacodita iti vakṣyamāṇena
sambandhaḥ | yamarthaṃ sāsnādimantaṃ puraskṛtyālambanīkṛtya viśiṣṭārthakriyārthī | tamevāha |
yathetyādi | yathā gorvāhadohādāvarthī gāmadhikṛtya pravarttate | anyasambhavina iti
goranyasminnaśve sambhavinorthasyārthī gāṃ puraskṛtya na pravarttata iti vākyārthaḥ
samarthanīyaḥ| korthonyasambhavītyāha | yathā yuddhapraveśa iti | yathāsvamiti yasya
yaḥ śabdo vācakaḥ | na dravyatvādi sāmānyaṃ | coditamiti liṅgavipariṇāmena
sambandhaḥ | taccodanayā gavādīnāṃ gavādiśabdaracodanayā | tadetyarthakriyārthinaḥ

sambandhāpauruṣeyatve syāt pratītirasaṃvidaḥ ||229||
syādetad (1) akāryasambandhā eva śabdā na tetheṃbu puruṣairanyathā viparyāsyante |
tenādoṣa iti kimidānīṃ saṃketena | sa hi sambandho yatorthapratītiḥ |
nāyaṃ samayamapekṣeta (1) apratītyāśrayāḥ kathaṃ sambandhāḥ ( 1 )
saṃketāttabhivyaktāvasamarthānyakalpanā |
na bai sambandho vidyamānopyanabhivyaktiḥ pratītihetuḥ (1) saṃketa (: kha ) lve-
namabhivyaktimetarhi siddhopasthāyī kimakāraṇaṃ poṣyate |
tatrāha | sambandhāpauruṣeyatva ityādi | śabdārthayossambandhāpauruṣayatvebhyupa
gamyamāne syāt pratotirarthapratipattirasamvidaḥ | saṃketajñānaṃ samvit | sā na
vidyate yasya tasya | akāryaḥ puruṣairajanyaḥ sambandho yeṣānte tathā | te śabdā aryeṣu
vācyeṣu puruṣairyathārthaprakāśakatvāt | svabhāvādanyathā viparyasyante vitaṃthajñānahetavo
na kriyante | tenāviparyāsenādoṣo visamvādalakṣaṇo doṣo nāsti | idānīmiti
sambandhāpauruṣeyatve ki saṃketena prayojanaṃ | yasmāt sa hi śabdārthayossambandhaḥ sa
cedarthapratītihetuḥ sambandhopauruṣeyastadā nāyaṃ puruṣo nisargasiddhasambandhatvāccha
bdādarthaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ samayamapekṣeta | pradīpādivat | apekṣate ca saṃketantasmānna
śabdānāmarthena sahāpauruṣeyaḥ sambandho rājacihnādivat |
(6) syānmatam (|) apauruṣeya eva sambandhaḥ sa tu saṃketanirapekṣo pratītyāśraya
ityāha | apratītyāśrayorthapratīterevāśrayo vā kathaṃ sambandhaḥ (1) naiva |
pratītyanyathānupapattyā sambandhakalpanāt | pratītyabhāve kathaṃ sambandhaḥ | atha ( 1 )
"jñāpakatvāddhi sambandha: svātmajñānamapekṣate |
tenāsau vidyamānopi nāgṛhītaḥ prakāśakaḥ |.
sarveṣāmanabhivyaktānāṃ pūrvapūrvaprayoktaḥ ( 1 )
siddhaḥ sambandha ityevaṃ sambandhādirna vidyata iti |”
